Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers

Class StructureSpecificationManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers.StructureSpecificationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable
@Singleton public final class StructureSpecificationManager extends Restartable
Represents a manager for handling structure specifications requests.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive(IPPlayer player)
      Checks if there is an open structure specification request for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      True if there is an open structure specification request for the player.

    • placeRequest

      public void placeRequest(IPPlayer player, DelayedInputRequest<String> request)
      Registers a new delayed input request for the given player.

      If a request is already active for the given player, the old request will be cancelled and replaced by the new one.

      Parameters:
      player - The player to request.
      request - The request.

    • handleInput

      public boolean handleInput(IPPlayer player, String input)
      Handles input for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that provided input.
      input - The input to handle.
      Returns:
      False if no request could be found for the player.

    • cancelRequest

      public boolean cancelRequest(IPPlayer player)
      Cancels an active request for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose requests to cancel.
      Returns:
      True if a request was cancelled.

    • shutDown

      public void shutDown()
      Description copied from interface: IRestartable
